meanings.definition: No commonly-used, simple definitions found for 'obstreperousnesses'.
meanings.sent1: The obstreperousnesses of the children in the classroom made it hard for the teacher to focus.
meanings.sent2: The noise level in the library increased due to the obstreperousnesses of the rowdy group of students.
meanings.sent3: The obstreperousnesses of the puppies playing in the yard brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, filling it with obstreperousnesses.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outside matched the obstreperousnesses of the argument happening inside.
